   20: 
   21: -module(bs_utf_no_copt_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   24: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   25:          verify_highest_opcode/1,
   26: 	 utf8_roundtrip/1,unused_utf_char/1,utf16_roundtrip/1,
   27: 	 utf32_roundtrip/1,guard/1,extreme_tripping/1,
   28: 	 literals/1,coverage/1]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [verify_highest_opcode,
   36:      utf8_roundtrip, unused_utf_char, utf16_roundtrip,
   37:      utf32_roundtrip, guard, extreme_tripping, literals,
   38:      coverage].
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [].
   42: 
   43: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   44:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   48:     ok.
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: verify_highest_opcode(_Config) ->
   57:     case ?MODULE of
   58:         bs_construct_r24_SUITE ->
   59:             {ok,Beam} = file:read_file(code:which(?MODULE)),
   60:             case test_lib:highest_opcode(Beam) of
   61:                 Highest when Highest =< 176 ->
   62:                     ok;
   63:                 TooHigh ->
   64:                     ct:fail({too_high_opcode,TooHigh})
   65:             end;
   66:         bs_construct_r25_SUITE ->
   67:             {ok,Beam} = file:read_file(code:which(?MODULE)),
   68:             case test_lib:highest_opcode(Beam) of
   69:                 Highest when Highest =< 180 ->
   70:                     ok;
   71:                 TooHigh ->
   72:                     ct:fail({too_high_opcode,TooHigh})
   73:             end;
   74:         _ ->
   75:             ok
   76:     end.
   77: 
   78: utf8_roundtrip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     [utf8_roundtrip_1(P) || P <- utf_data()],
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: utf8_roundtrip_1({Str,Bin,Bin}) ->
   83:     Str = utf8_to_list(Bin),
   84:     Bin = list_to_utf8(Str),
   85:     [ok = utf8_guard(C, <<42,C/utf8>>) || C <- Str],
   86:     [error = utf8_guard(C, <<C/utf8>>) || C <- Str],
   87:     ok.
   88: 
   89: utf8_guard(C, Bin) when <<42,C/utf8>> =:= Bin -> ok;
   90: utf8_guard(_, _) -> error.
   91: 
   92: utf8_to_list(<<C/utf8,T/binary>>) ->
   93:     [C|utf8_to_list(T)];
   94: utf8_to_list(<<>>) -> [].
   95: 
   96: list_to_utf8(L) ->
   97:     list_to_utf8(L, <<>>).
   98: 
   99: list_to_utf8([H|T], Bin) ->
  100:     list_to_utf8(T, <<Bin/binary,H/utf8>>);
  101: list_to_utf8([], Bin) -> Bin.
  102: 
  103: unused_utf_char(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     [true = utf8_len(Utf8) =:= length(Str) ||
  105: 	{Str,Utf8} <- utf_data()],
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: utf8_len(B) ->
  109:     utf8_len(B, 0).
  110: 
  111: utf8_len(<<_/utf8,T/binary>>, N) ->
  112:     utf8_len(T, N+1);
  113: utf8_len(<<>>, N) -> N.
  114: 
  115: utf16_roundtrip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     {Str,Big,Big,Little,Little} = utf16_data(),
  117:     4 = utf16_big_len(Big),
  118:     4 = utf16_little_len(Little),
  119:     Str = big_utf16_to_list(Big),
  120:     Str = little_utf16_to_list(Little),
  121: 
  122:     Big = list_to_big_utf16(Str),
  123:     Little = list_to_little_utf16(Str),
  124: 
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: utf16_big_len(B) ->
  128:     utf16_big_len(B, 0).
  129: 
  130: utf16_big_len(<<_/utf16,T/binary>>, N) ->
  131:     utf16_big_len(T, N+1);
  132: utf16_big_len(<<>>, N) -> N.
  133: 
  134: utf16_little_len(B) ->
  135:     utf16_little_len(B, 0).
  136: 
  137: utf16_little_len(<<_/little-utf16,T/binary>>, N) ->
  138:     utf16_little_len(T, N+1);
  139: utf16_little_len(<<>>, N) -> N.
  140: 
  141: list_to_big_utf16(List) ->
  142:     list_to_big_utf16(List, <<>>).
  143: 
  144: list_to_big_utf16([H|T], Bin) ->
  145:     list_to_big_utf16(T, <<Bin/binary,H/utf16>>);
  146: list_to_big_utf16([], Bin) -> Bin.
  147: 
  148: list_to_little_utf16(List) ->
  149:     list_to_little_utf16(List, <<>>).
  150: 
  151: list_to_little_utf16([H|T], Bin) ->
  152:     list_to_little_utf16(T, <<Bin/binary,H/little-utf16>>);
  153: list_to_little_utf16([], Bin) -> Bin.
  154: 
  155: big_utf16_to_list(<<H/utf16,T/binary>>) ->
  156:     [H|big_utf16_to_list(T)];
  157: big_utf16_to_list(<<>>) -> [].
  158: 
  159: little_utf16_to_list(<<H/little-utf16,T/binary>>) ->
  160:     [H|little_utf16_to_list(T)];
  161: little_utf16_to_list(<<>>) -> [].
  162: 
  163: utf32_roundtrip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     {Str,Big,Big,Little,Little} = utf32_data(),
  165:     4 = utf32_big_len(Big),
  166:     4 = utf32_little_len(Little),
  167:     Str = big_utf32_to_list(Big),
  168:     Str = little_utf32_to_list(Little),
  169: 
  170:     Big = list_to_big_utf32(Str),
  171:     Little = list_to_little_utf32(Str),
  172: 
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: utf32_big_len(B) ->
  176:     utf32_big_len(B, 0).
  177: 
  178: utf32_big_len(<<_/utf32,T/binary>>, N) ->
  179:     utf32_big_len(T, N+1);
  180: utf32_big_len(<<>>, N) -> N.
  181: 
  182: utf32_little_len(B) ->
  183:     utf32_little_len(B, 0).
  184: 
  185: utf32_little_len(<<_/little-utf32,T/binary>>, N) ->
  186:     utf32_little_len(T, N+1);
  187: utf32_little_len(<<>>, N) -> N.
  188: 
  189: list_to_big_utf32(List) ->
  190:     list_to_big_utf32(List, <<>>).
  191: 
  192: list_to_big_utf32([H|T], Bin) ->
  193:     list_to_big_utf32(T, <<Bin/binary,H/utf32>>);
  194: list_to_big_utf32([], Bin) -> Bin.
  195: 
  196: list_to_little_utf32(List) ->
  197:     list_to_little_utf32(List, <<>>).
  198: 
  199: list_to_little_utf32([H|T], Bin) ->
  200:     list_to_little_utf32(T, <<Bin/binary,H/little-utf32>>);
  201: list_to_little_utf32([], Bin) -> Bin.
  202: 
  203: big_utf32_to_list(<<H/utf32,T/binary>>) ->
  204:     [H|big_utf32_to_list(T)];
  205: big_utf32_to_list(<<>>) -> [].
  206: 
  207: little_utf32_to_list(<<H/little-utf32,T/binary>>) ->
  208:     [H|little_utf32_to_list(T)];
  209: little_utf32_to_list(<<>>) -> [].
  210: 
  211: 
  212: guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  213:     error = do_guard(16#D800),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: do_guard(C) when byte_size(<<C/utf8>>) =/= 42 -> ok;
  217: do_guard(C) when byte_size(<<C/utf16>>) =/= 42 -> ok;
  218: do_guard(C) when byte_size(<<C/utf32>>) =/= 42 -> ok;
  219: do_guard(_) -> error.
  220: 
  221: %% The purpose of this test is to make sure that
  222: %% the delayed creation of sub-binaries works.
  223: 
  224: extreme_tripping(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  225:     Unicode = lists:seq(0, 1024),
  226:     Utf8 = unicode_to_utf8(Unicode, <<>>),
  227:     Utf16 = utf8_to_utf16(Utf8, <<>>),
  228:     Utf32 = utf8_to_utf32(Utf8, <<>>),
  229:     Utf32 = utf16_to_utf32(Utf16, <<>>),
  230:     Utf8 = utf32_to_utf8(Utf32, <<>>),
  231:     Unicode = utf32_to_unicode(Utf32),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: unicode_to_utf8([C|T], Bin) ->
  235:     unicode_to_utf8(T, <<Bin/bytes,C/utf8>>);
  236: unicode_to_utf8([], Bin) -> Bin.
  237: 
  238: utf8_to_utf16(<<C/utf8,T/binary>>, Bin) ->
  239:     utf8_to_utf16(T, <<Bin/bytes,C/utf16>>);
  240: utf8_to_utf16(<<>>, Bin) -> Bin.
  241: 
  242: utf16_to_utf32(<<C/utf16,T/binary>>, Bin) ->
  243:     utf16_to_utf32(T, <<Bin/bytes,C/utf32>>);
  244: utf16_to_utf32(<<>>, Bin) -> Bin.
  245: 
  246: utf8_to_utf32(<<C/utf8,T/binary>>, Bin) ->
  247:     utf8_to_utf32(T, <<Bin/bytes,C/utf32>>);
  248: utf8_to_utf32(<<>>, Bin) -> Bin.
  249: 
  250: utf32_to_utf8(<<C/utf32,T/binary>>, Bin) ->
  251:     utf32_to_utf8(T, <<Bin/bytes,C/utf8>>);
  252: utf32_to_utf8(<<>>, Bin) -> Bin.
  253: 
  254: utf32_to_unicode(<<C/utf32,T/binary>>) ->
  255:     [C|utf32_to_unicode(T)];
  256: utf32_to_unicode(<<>>) -> [].
  257: 
  258: literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  259:     <<>> = id(<<""/utf8>>),
  260:     <<>> = id(<<""/utf16>>),
  261:     <<>> = id(<<""/little-utf16>>),
  262:     <<>> = id(<<""/native-utf16>>),
  263:     <<>> = id(<<""/utf32>>),
  264:     <<>> = id(<<""/little-utf32>>),
  265:     <<>> = id(<<""/native-utf32>>),
  266: 
  267:     abc_utf8 = match_literal(<<"abc"/utf8>>),
  268:     abc_utf8 = match_literal(<<$a,$b,$c>>),
  269:     abc_utf8 = match_literal(<<$a/utf8,$b/utf8,$c/utf8>>),
  270: 
  271:     abc_utf16be = match_literal(<<"abc"/utf16>>),
  272:     abc_utf16be = match_literal(<<$a:16,$b:16,$c:16>>),
  273:     abc_utf16le = match_literal(<<"abc"/little-utf16>>),
  274:     abc_utf16le = match_literal(<<$a:16/little,$b:16/little,$c:16/little>>),
  275: 
  276:     abc_utf32be = match_literal(<<"abc"/utf32>>),
  277:     abc_utf32be = match_literal(<<$a:32,$b:32,$c:32>>),
  278:     abc_utf32le = match_literal(<<"abc"/little-utf32>>),
  279:     abc_utf32le = match_literal(<<$a:32/little,$b:32/little,$c:32/little>>),
  280: 
  281:     mm_utf8 = match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/utf8>>),
  282:     mm_utf16be = match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/utf16>>),
  283:     mm_utf32be = match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/utf32>>),
  284: 
  285:     bjorn_utf8 = match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/utf8>>),
  286:     bjorn_utf8 = match_literal(<<$b,$j,195,182,$r,$n>>),
  287: 
  288:     bjorn_utf16be = match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/utf16>>),
  289:     bjorn_utf16be = match_literal(<<$b:16,$j:16,246:16,$r:16,$n:16>>),
  290:     bjorn_utf16le = match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/little-utf16>>),
  291:     bjorn_utf16le = match_literal(<<$b:16/little,$j:16/little,
  292: 					 246:16/little,$r:16/little,
  293: 					 $n:16/little>>),
  294:     <<244,143,191,191>> = <<16#10ffff/utf8>>,
  295: 
  296:     %% Invalid literals.
  297:     I = 0,
  298:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<(-1)/utf8,I/utf8>>),
  299:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<(-1)/utf16,I/utf8>>),
  300:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<(-1)/little-utf16,I/utf8>>),
  301:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<(-1)/utf32,I/utf8>>),
  302:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<(-1)/little-utf32,I/utf8>>),
  303:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<16#D800/utf8,I/utf8>>),
  304:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<16#D800/utf16,I/utf8>>),
  305:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<16#D800/little-utf16,I/utf8>>),
  306:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<16#D800/utf32,I/utf8>>),
  307:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<16#D800/little-utf32,I/utf8>>),
  308: 
  309:     B = 16#10FFFF+1,
  310:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<B/utf8>>),
  311:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<B/utf16>>),
  312:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<B/little-utf16>>),
  313:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<B/utf32>>),
  314:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch <<B/little-utf32>>),
  315: 
  316:     %% Matching of bad literals.
  317:     error = bad_literal_match(<<237,160,128>>), %16#D800 in UTF-8
  318:     error = bad_literal_match(<<244,144,128,128>>), %16#110000 in UTF-8
  319: 
  320:     error = bad_literal_match(<<16#D800:32>>),
  321:     error = bad_literal_match(<<16#110000:32>>),
  322:     error = bad_literal_match(<<16#D800:32/little>>),
  323:     error = bad_literal_match(<<16#110000:32/little>>),
  324: 
  325:     ok.
  326: 
  327: match_literal(<<"abc"/utf8>>) -> abc_utf8;
  328: match_literal(<<"abc"/big-utf16>>) -> abc_utf16be;
  329: match_literal(<<"abc"/little-utf16>>) -> abc_utf16le;
  330: match_literal(<<"abc"/big-utf32>>) -> abc_utf32be;
  331: match_literal(<<"abc"/little-utf32>>) -> abc_utf32le;
  332: match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/utf8>>) -> mm_utf8;
  333: match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/utf16>>) -> mm_utf16be;
  334: match_literal(<<"Мастер и Маргарита"/big-utf32>>) -> mm_utf32be;
  335: match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/utf8>>) -> bjorn_utf8;
  336: match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/big-utf16>>) -> bjorn_utf16be;
  337: match_literal(<<"bj\366rn"/little-utf16>>) -> bjorn_utf16le.
  338: 
  339: bad_literal_match(<<16#D800/utf8>>) -> ok;
  340: bad_literal_match(<<16#110000/utf8>>) -> ok;
  341: bad_literal_match(<<16#D800/utf32>>) -> ok;
  342: bad_literal_match(<<16#110000/utf32>>) -> ok;
  343: bad_literal_match(<<16#D800/little-utf32>>) -> ok;
  344: bad_literal_match(<<16#110000/little-utf32>>) -> ok;
  345: bad_literal_match(_) -> error.
  346:     
  347: coverage(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     %% Cover bit syntax matching optimizations in v3_kernel.
  349:     0 = coverage_1(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,0>>),
  350:     1 = coverage_1(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,1>>),
  351: 
  352:     0 = coverage_2(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,0>>),
  353:     1 = coverage_2(<<1024/utf8,1025/utf8,1>>),
  354: 
  355:     fc(catch coverage_3(1)),
  356: 
  357:     %% Cover beam_flatten (combining the heap allocation in
  358:     %% a subsequent test_heap instruction into the bs_init2
  359:     %% instruction).
  360:     {ok,<<533/utf8>>} = cover_test_heap_utf8(533),
  361:     {ok,<<1024/utf16>>} = cover_test_heap_utf16(1024),
  362:     {ok,<<7966/utf32>>} = cover_test_heap_utf32(7966),
  363: 
  364:     ok.
  365:     
  366: coverage_1(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,0>>) -> 0;
  367: coverage_1(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,1>>) -> 1.
  368: 
  369: coverage_2(<<4096/utf8,65536/utf8,0>>) -> 0;
  370: coverage_2(<<1024/utf8,1025/utf8,1>>) -> 1.
  371: 
  372: coverage_3(<<16#7fffffff/utf8,65536/utf8,0>>) -> 0.
  373: 
  374: cover_test_heap_utf8(C) -> {ok,<<C/utf8>>}.
  375: cover_test_heap_utf16(C) -> {ok,<<C/utf16>>}.
  376: cover_test_heap_utf32(C) -> {ok,<<C/utf32>>}.
  377: 
  378: utf_data() ->
  379: %% From RFC-3629.
  380: 
  381:     %% Give the compiler a chance to do some constant propagation.
  382:     NotIdentical = 16#2262,
  383: 
  384:     [
  385:      %% "A<NOT IDENTICAL TO><ALPHA>."
  386:      {[16#0041,NotIdentical,16#0391,16#002E],
  387:       <<16#0041/utf8,NotIdentical/utf8,16#0391/utf8,16#002E/utf8>>,
  388:       <<16#41,16#E2,16#89,16#A2,16#CE,16#91,16#2E>>},
  389: 
  390:      %% Korean "hangugeo" (meaning "the Korean language")
  391:      {[16#D55C,16#AD6D,16#C5B4],
  392:       <<16#D55C/utf8,16#AD6D/utf8,16#C5B4/utf8>>,
  393:       <<16#ED,16#95,16#9C,16#EA,16#B5,16#AD,16#EC,16#96,16#B4>>},
  394: 
  395:      %% Japanese "nihongo" (meaning "the Japanese language").
  396:      {[16#65E5,16#672C,16#8A9E],
  397:       <<16#65E5/utf8,16#672C/utf8,16#8A9E/utf8>>,
  398:       <<16#E6,16#97,16#A5,16#E6,16#9C,16#AC,16#E8,16#AA,16#9E>>}
  399:     ].
  400: 
  401: utf16_data() ->
  402:     %% Example from RFC-2781. "*=Ra", where "*" represents a
  403:     %% hypothetical Ra hieroglyph (code point 16#12345).
  404: 
  405:     %% Give the compiler a chance to do some constant propagation.
  406:     RaHieroglyph = 16#12345,
  407: 
  408:     %% First as a list of Unicode characters.
  409:     {[RaHieroglyph,16#3D,16#52,16#61],
  410: 
  411:      %% Big endian (the two binaries should be equal).
  412:      <<RaHieroglyph/big-utf16,16#3D/big-utf16,16#52/big-utf16,16#61/big-utf16>>,
  413:      <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45,16#00,16#3D,16#00,16#52,16#00,16#61>>,
  414: 
  415:      %% Little endian (the two binaries should be equal).
  416:      <<RaHieroglyph/little-utf16,16#3D/little-utf16,
  417:       16#52/little-utf16,16#61/little-utf16>>,
  418:      <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF,16#3D,16#00,16#52,16#00,16#61,16#00>>}.
  419: 
  420: utf32_data() ->
  421:     %% "A<NOT IDENTICAL TO><ALPHA>."
  422:     NotIdentical = 16#2262,
  423:     {[16#0041,NotIdentical,16#0391,16#002E],
  424: 
  425:      %% Big endian.
  426:      <<16#0041/utf32,NotIdentical/utf32,16#0391/utf32,16#002E/utf32>>,
  427:      <<16#41:32,NotIdentical:32,16#0391:32,16#2E:32>>,
  428: 
  429:      %% Little endian.
  430:      <<16#0041/little-utf32,NotIdentical/little-utf32,
  431:       16#0391/little-utf32,16#002E/little-utf32>>,
  432:      <<16#41:32/little,NotIdentical:32/little,
  433:       16#0391:32/little,16#2E:32/little>>}.
  434:      
  435: fc({'EXIT',{function_clause,_}}) -> ok;
  436: fc({'EXIT',{{case_clause,_},_}}) when ?MODULE =:= bs_utf_inline_SUITE -> ok.
  437: 
  438: id(I) -> I.
